tool_description: Monitors backup job execution against scheduled times, tracks delays and missed executions, and calculates schedule compliance metrics.

job_name.description: Name of the backup job to monitor

scheduled_time.description: When the job was scheduled to run

error_messages: Invalid datetime format: All time parameters must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings.
Logical time error: actual_start_time cannot be before scheduled_time by more than tolerance_minutes.
Completion before start: completion_time cannot be before actual_start_time.
Negative tolerance: tolerance_minutes must be a positive integer.
Missing job name: job_name cannot be empty.
usage: Provide job_name and scheduled_time as minimum requirements. Include actual_start_time and completion_time when available to get comprehensive compliance metrics.

delay_minutes.description: Minutes delayed from scheduled time (0 if on time)

within_tolerance.description: Whether the delay is within acceptable tolerance

execution_duration_minutes.description: Total execution time in minutes (0 if not completed)

compliance_score.description: Compliance score from 0.0 to 1.0 based on delay
